document_data.caption: A map showing the Llyrath Forest on Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Llyrath Forest
document_data.mainbody: The '''Llyrath Forest''' blanketed the southern coast of the isle of [[Gwynneth]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]]. It was considered one of the wildest areas of the kingdom of [[Corwell]], with few [[human]] residents, and was home to wild animals such as [[boar]]s and [[bear]]s.
document_data.Geography: The forest covered much of southwestern Gwynneth, stretching east to west for over {{SI|100|mi|k|long=yes}}.{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Fauna: [[Pheasant]]s, [[quail]], [[rabbit]]s, and [[deer]] were present within the forest. Several types of [[fungus]] on Gwynneth could only be found in Llyrath.
